job.title: Junior Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtMission Essential HCS is seeking a Junior Software Engineer for a fulltime opportunity with our client in San Diego CAltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtResponsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtParticipating in the full software development cycle starting from requirement identificationltligtltligtPerforming software and API design for upcoming release featuresltligtltligtCoding and testing of assigned release featuresltligtltligtLeading system and subsystem integration of new release featuresltligtltligtAssisting in software defect triage and resolutionltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtRequirementsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtBachelors degree in computer engineering or computer science or equivalentltligtltligt3 Years of experience as a software developer design coding and testing in commercial environment from requirements identification to deploymentltligtltligt3 years of solid C and C Programming including strong Object Oriented Design principlesltligtltligtProactive candidate with excellent oral and written communication skills and the ability to provide direction or training to other team membersltligtltulgtltpgtltpgt
